title: She Can Also Be Gentle - Novel Updates
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Calm Protagonist   Caring Protagonist   Cold Love Interests   Devoted Love Interests   Doting Love Interests   Modern Day   Unconditional Love
author: 妲婴
description: In the second semester of high school, a transfer student came to Class 6. The new classmate is beautiful and cool. If nothing happens to her, I'm so sorry for the age of spring. Many years later, people in the circle knew that Gu was always a cold beauty, decisive and not affectionate, but only Chi Nuan knew that she was once a gentle and sweet little lover in her old days. The front part of the campus, the back part of the society. 'Blooming' series of articles, modern and semi-overhead.>
